name: epic platformer (not official name)
description:
hey! this is a short platformer game i made and i hope you enjoy it

it is in very early development and if you have any suggestions put them in the discussion board and there is almost an 100% chance ill add it

i will do my own updates with this game and it is in prototype so lots of changes will be made that i hope you will enjoy

feedback is encouraged and have fun :)
